channel.title: Comments on: Stephin Merritt scores stage version of Coraline

item.title: By: chris
item.dc:creator: chris
item.description:
Hi Eric,
Nice post on the musical. My associate is working on this project, but I keep track of it as well.
I wanted to get in touch about the artist Matthew Barber who just release his US debut for drawer b consideration. He begins a US tour next week and I'd love to send a link to download the record and additional details.
www.matthewbarber.com
- Chris
item.content:encoded:
Hi Eric,

Nice post on the musical. My associate is working on this project, but I keep track of it as well.

I wanted to get in touch about the artist Matthew Barber who just release his US debut for drawer b consideration. He begins a US tour next week and I’d love to send a link to download the record and additional details.

http://www.matthewbarber.com/

– Chris
